nodes.description: 1月20日喀布尔洲际酒店遭塔利班武装袭击，持续16小时致18人死亡
nodes.support_text: The Jalalabad attack comes just days after at least 18 civilians were killed and 22 others wounded in an assault on the Inter-Continental Hotel in Kabul.

nodes.description: 周三凌晨Jalalabad Save the Children办公室发生自杀式爆炸和枪击
nodes.support_text: Two security guards and one civilian were killed and at least 25 others were wounded when a suicide attacker detonated a car bomb outside the headquarters of the international charity in Jalalabad early on Wednesday morning.

nodes.description: 爆炸后 attacker与Afghan安全部队在建筑内交火超8小时
nodes.support_text: Al Jazeera’s Jennifer Glasse, reporting from Kabul, said 47 people were rescued from the office building after Afghan security forces and the attackers battled each other for more than eight hours.

nodes.description: 47名被困人员被救出，至少2名attacker死亡
nodes.support_text: Pajhwok Afghan News reported. Speaking to Al Jazeera from Jalalabad, Humayoon Babur, an Afghan journalist, said the attack had taken place in 'the heart of the city'.

nodes.description: ISIS通过Amaq网站宣称对袭击负责，称目标为英瑞机构
nodes.support_text: The Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL, also known as ISIS) has claimed responsibility for the attack via the group’s Amaq website, describing the targets as 'British and Swedish institutes'.

nodes.description: Save the Children宣布暂停阿富汗所有运营，确认3名员工死亡
nodes.support_text: Save the Children said it was suspending its operations in Afghanistan until it was safe to resume work. In a statement, the children’s aid group confirmed that three of its staff members were killed.

nodes.description: ICRC声明谴责袭击，指出暴力加剧工作难度
nodes.support_text: Monica Zanarelli, head of the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) in Afghanistan, has called the attack 'outrageous'. 'Increased violence has made operating in Afghanistan difficult for many organisations,' she said in a statement on Wednesday.

nodes.description: 阿富汗记者证实袭击发生在城市中心政府建筑区
nodes.support_text: Humayoon Babur, an Afghan journalist, said the attack had taken place in 'the heart of the city'. '[The area] is home to many government buildings ... [and] the provincial government office,' he said.

nodes.description: Pajhwok Afghan News 报道了事件内容（击毙与战斗爆发）
